DOC.brief_summary: This study will investigate the steroid sparing effect of pimecrolimus cream 1% in pediatric atopic dermatitis
DOC.brief_title: Steroid-Sparing Effect With Pimecrolimus in Pediatric Patients With Atopic Dermatitis
DOC.criteria: Outpatients aged 2 to < 18 years with severe AD (score 8 or 9 according to Rajka and Langeland) responded to 21 days of treatment with prednicarbate cream 0.25% during screening phase Patients who had received phototherapy, systemic or topical therapy or systemic corticosteroids shortly prior to study
